feed.title: Google Cloud: App Engine flexible environment .NET
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: App Engine flexible environment .NET

entry.summary: The .NET 10 runtime is now available for general use on App Engine flexible environment. This feature provides enhanced support for .NET applications, allowing developers to leverage the latest .NET capabilities within Google Cloud.
entry.title: Feature: .NET 10 Runtime Now Generally Available

entry.summary: The .NET 10 runtime is now available in preview for App Engine flexible environment. This new runtime support allows developers to leverage the latest .NET features and performance improvements. Explore the preview and provide your feedback.
entry.title: Feature: .NET 10 Runtime Now in Preview

entry.content: To increase security, starting in March 2025, support for Transport Layer Security (TLS) version 1.1 and earlier is deprecated. Update your application settings in the App Engine flexible environment to use TLS version 1.2 and later, along with a corresponding secure set of cipher suites (Preview).
entry.summary: TLS 1.1 and earlier support deprecated in March 2025. Update your App Engine settings to use TLS 1.2 or later.
entry.title: Feature: TLS Deprecation Update
